document.full_text: abortion rates have gone down in most groups of u.s. women, but not among poor women, a new study shows. among the lowest-income women, abortions are still on the rise.
document.title: u.s. abortion rate down, but up among poor women
lines_and_colors: abortion rates have gone down in most groups of u.s. women, but not among poor women, a new study shows. among the lowest-income women, abortions are still on the rise.
